name: Hallowed Grotto
description: Downpour, More Flora, Lunacy & M4rblelous Entity Pack strongly recommended but not required.<LINE>A lush cave system relatively untouched by the ancients which is located deep underground.<LINE>Connects Garbage Wastes, Drainage System, Subterranean, Shoreline... and maybe somewhere else?<LINE>Now featuring entirely optional connections to Arid Barrens, Sacred Garden and Sizzling Sewers!<LINE>Additional features:<LINE>A whole bunch of worldbuilding, featuring 5 pearls with unique dialogue from LttM, FP & CW as well as over 20 broadcasts.<LINE>A main region and 4 small subregions.<LINE>Almost every room changes slightly from campaign to campaign.<LINE>A unique world state for Pitch Black campaigns, campaigns set between Riv and Saint and post Saint campaigns.<LINE>A wide array of creatures from vanilla, Downpour and the modding community, with some creatures being only present in certain campaigns and some needing to be lineaged.<LINE>An extensive lineage system.<LINE>Extensive changes for Inv and compatibility with 'The Entropy' slugcat.<LINE><LINE>Big thanks to Bro for answering all my questions, SchuhBaum for making the plugin this mod used to use but doesn't need anymore, FlickerAway for the region art & Umbra for the one unnamed custom song this region has and Joseph Nied for the song 'Hidden Life'.
